post.body: Bon Apetit
trade shows are moving toward GO BIG OR GO HOME, which will become too costly for the average small business - soon.
well i am that anal about brand communication.. shit myself when i see incongruence in mediums of projection.. i bleed Coca Cola red
i like your verbose-ness.. or is that verbosity..? i like to be around people who talk the way i think. my mouth fails me 24/7
could be seen as good technique. won't last, but still good if objective is short-term. u way too pure-blooded. i bet u bleed SEO..
uh.. ok.. you and @rafiq both speak in either incomplete or incomprehensible (by us "muggles") sentences.
u cannot make yourself important. it's bestowed on you by others. google is nothing without people actually searching.

not working at the mo playa.. just kicking back.. maybe do a blogpost on predictions for 2009 later today.
KRS One said: Gimme relief, squash all beef, don't let these arguments destroy us. So we cool? Aaight..
have a use for it already. however i intend to do work after wednesday again.. now.. just loungin'
amen
